meanings.definition: A person who resides or is present in a house, vehicle, or other place.
meanings.sent1: The occupants of the house were friendly neighbors.
meanings.sent2: The occupants of the car waved as they drove by.
meanings.sent3: The occupants of the spaceship were surprised to see a UFO.
meanings.sent4: The forest was silent, except for the rustling of the occupants.
meanings.sent5: The occupants of the castle welcomed the royal guests with open arms.

meanings.definition: The people who are currently using a particular building or place.
meanings.sent1: The occupants of the office worked diligently on their projects.
meanings.sent2: The occupants of the theater applauded the amazing performance.
meanings.sent3: The occupants of the zoo enjoyed watching the playful monkeys.
meanings.sent4: The stadium roared with excitement as the occupants cheered for their team.
meanings.sent5: The occupants of the library whispered softly among the bookshelves.
